        summary_files = sorted(glob.glob(os.path.join(summaries_dir, "summary_*.json")))

                summary_data = json.load(f)
                summaries.append(summary_data)
                
        return summaries
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"⚠ Error loading summaries: {str(e)}")
        return []
